description: I hired Jake to do some work on my backyard. During his break, I offered him a little extra cash, modelling. He agreed as long as he could wear the mask. Done deal! Jake's body is very lean and ripped. He wants to gain more mass but I personally like him just the way he is. In addition, Jake is very well-endowed, a good 8.5 incher fully erect. He's never used a Fleshlight before so I decided to give it to him, as a gift, as long as he tried it during the shoot. A real joy to watch!
title: Lawnmower Man, Scene #01
